text:
this still needs to pass CI, but please watch out for <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3713/>

it completes the work on the basics of the common GRPCServer by adding function to dynamically add/remove root certificates which are used to verify/validate client certificates.   <@U0ZJZBJLF>  <@U0ULK2JPP> I'm hoping that we can leverage this in peer / gossip
<@U0PB67X4K> the preliminary join seems to work. but there has to be a post work on the peer setup and manage channel structures nicely. The grpc server could fit into that for the peer side
<@U11MANG9G> aw come on, I kinda liked that :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U0ULK2JPP>: OK, OK, no need to bite! :grin:

<https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3237/>   and <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3719/> could use some love.  One is for COP and the other updates the NodeSDK to match the updated enroll function
thanks for the merges ^^^^   .  Just pulled latest from COP and NodeSDK repos and the integration does indeed work  :wink:

text: another step toward reworking committer service: <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3703/>
well, realized it need rebasing, waiting for CI to finish :confused:
folks : <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3539/> needs love and blessings again. Thanks.
<@U0KM61BCP> <@U0ULK2JPP> I pushed a minor changes to <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3377/> that you have reviewed;  please help merge
<https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/3597/> has had two +2's in its lifetime, but was rebased, so now needs one more ( <@U0KM61BCP> yours was wiped out in the rebase )
